p: Amoxicillin and phosphate buffered saline were purchased from Sigma (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA). All types of microbiological culture media were purchased from Oxoid (Oxoid Ltd., Cheshire, UK). Trans-caryophyllene, Î±-humulene, eugenol and germacrene D were purchased from Chromadex (ChromaDex, Irvine, CA, USA). Tween 20, defibrinated horse blood, dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), absolute ethanol, ethyl acetate, methanol, acetonitrile, formic acid, and water (HPLC grade) were purchased from Merck (Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany).
